attributes.action: price cap a litre of fuel
attributes.additional_details: by capping the price of a litre of fuel would make the cost of living fair for all with in a 5 mile radius here the difference is 18p from the dearest to the cheapest when the fuel is all the same
attributes.background: cap the price of fuel to stop stations charging prices set by the owners with the state of play by capping the price of a litre would make it fair across the country

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. The Government isn't responsible for setting the price of fuel and energy, which is a matter for suppliers.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
